content.text: Let's learn how to describe where you live. You'll talk to a colleague about your home.

data.tip: The 'h' at the beginning of 'habite' is silent. The 'j' links with the 'a' to make a 'zha' sound.

data.meaning: I live in... (used for a house, apartment, or neighborhood)

content.title: Sharing Basic Information
content.setting: Your colleague, Sophie, starts a conversation to get to know you better.

conversation_flow.title: Say in which city or neighborhood you live
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Salut ! Moi, j'habite à Paris. Et toi, tu habites où ?

extract_info.user_location: Extract the user's city or neighborhood from their message

conversation_flow.title: State whether you live in a house or an apartment
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Ah, {user_location} ! C'est sympa. Tu habites dans une maison ou dans un appartement ?

conversation_flow.title: Mention who you live with
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: D'accord. Et tu habites seul ou avec des colocataires ?

content.text: 'Il y a' is a key phrase for describing things. Use it to say what exists in a place.

content.title: Describing the Space
content.setting: Sophie is curious and asks for more details about your home.

conversation_flow.title: Say how many rooms your home has
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Intéressant ! Et il y a combien de pièces ?

conversation_flow.title: Mention a room you like
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: D'accord. Et il y a une pièce que tu aimes bien, comme la cuisine ou le salon ?

conversation_flow.title: State if you have a garden or a balcony
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: C'est super. Et tu as un jardin ou un balcon ?

content.text: In French, many adjectives change based on gender. Add an '-e' to 'content' if you are female.
Remember, 'un appartement' is masculine, so you use 'il est'. 'Une maison' is feminine, so you use 'elle est'.

content.title: Expressing Your Opinion
content.setting: To finish the conversation, Sophie asks how you feel about your place.

conversation_flow.title: Say you are happy with your home
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Génial ! Alors, tu es content avec ta maison / ton appartement ?
